info.title: Developer Services API - Authorized
info.description: Developer Services API - Everything you need to display your APIs.

post.description: Basic identity (Email) confirmation for a User.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.description: User specific delegation urls (CloseAccount, ChangePassword, ChangeProfile, Subscribe, Unsubscribe, Renew, Signout).

get.description: Get a user profile by its identifier.

patch.description: Create or updatea a user by its identifier.

delete.description: Delete a user by its identifier.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.description: List a collection of APIs.
Get the details of the API specified by its identifier.
List of OAuth 2.0 servers associated with the API.
Get OAuth 2.0 server specified by its identifier associated with the API.
List of OpenID Connect servers associated with the API.

Hostnames of the API.
Operations of the API.
Operation specified by its identifier of the API.
Operation tags specified by its identifier of the API.
List of public products associated with the API.
List of releases for the API.
List a collection of APIs schemas.
Get the details of the APIs schema specified by its identifier.
Tags of the API.
List a collection of API version sets.
Get API version set specified by its identifier.
List a collection of API version set APIs specified by its identifier.
List a collection of user identities.

put.description: Creates or updates the given user identity.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.description: List a collection of products.
Get the details of the product specified by its identifier.
List a collection of products APIs.
List a collection of products tags.
List a collection of tags.
List a collection of user subscriptions.
Get user subscription by its identifier.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.
There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

get.description: List a collection of tags.

post.description: Revoke the token of a user by its identifier.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Microsoft One API guidelines - https://github.com/Microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses.

name.description: API name. Must be 1 to 300 characters long.

subscriptionRequired.description: Specifies whether an API subscription is required for accessing the API.

protocols.description: Protocols over which API is made available.

tagDescriptions.description: Collection of Tag Descriptions included into this API.

authenticationSettings.description: Collection of authentication settings included into this API.

subscriptionKeyParameterNames.description: Names of Subscription key parameters used by the API.

termsOfServiceUrl.description: A URL to the Terms of Service for the API. MUST be in the format of a URL.

contact.description: Contact information for the exposed API.

license.description: License information for the exposed API.

name.description: The identifying name of the contact person/organization.

url.description: The URL pointing to the contact information. MUST be in the format of a URL.

email.description: The email address of the contact person/organization. MUST be in the format of an email address.

name.description: The license name used for the API.

url.description: A URL to the license used for the API. MUST be in the format of a URL.

values.name: Http
values.description: HTTP scheme will be supported for API

values.name: Https
values.description: HTTPS scheme will be supported for API

values.name: Ws
values.description: WebSocket scheme will be supported for API

values.name: Wss
values.description: WebSocket Secure scheme will be supported for API

contentType.description: Media type of the schema document (e.g. application/json, application/xml).

DeveloperServicesApi.Models.ApiSchema.description: A Schema used by an API.

oAuth2AuthenticationSettings.description: Collection of OAuth2 authentication settings included into this API.

openidAuthenticationSettings.description: Collection of OpenID Connect authentication settings included into this API.

subscriptionKeyRequired.description: Specifies whether subscription key is required during call to this API, true - API is included into closed products only, false - API is included into open products alone, null - there is a mix of products.

name.description: The unique identifier of the authorization server.

description.description: The human-readable name of the authorization server.

clientId.description: The client ID of the authorization server.

defaultScope.description: Scope applied by default on the console page. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.3"/>.

grantTypes.description: Form of an authorization grant, which the client uses to request the access token. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4"/>.

useInTestConsole.description: Authorization Server may be used in the test console.

useInApiDocumentation.description: Authorization Server may be used in the API documentation.

DeveloperServicesApi.Models.BearerTokenS.description: Form of an authorization grant, which the client uses to request the access token.

values.name: AuthorizationHeader
values.description: Access token will be transmitted in the Authorization header using Bearer schema.

values.name: Query
values.description: Access token will be transmitted as query parameter.

values.name: Basic
values.description: Client authentication information will be transmitted in the Authorization header using Basic schema.

values.name: Body
values.description: Client authentication information will be transmitted as www-url-form-encoded body parameter.

value.description: Embedded literal example. The `value` field and `externalValue` field are mutually exclusive. To represent examples of media types that cannot naturally represented in JSON or YAML, use a string value to contain the example, escaping where necessary.

externalValue.description: A URL that points to the literal example.

DeveloperServicesApi.Models.GrantType.description: Form of an authorization grant, which the client uses to request the access token. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4"/>.

to.description: The email address to send the confirmation to.

DeveloperServicesApi.Models.IdentityResu.description: UserId associate with credentials provided in request.

clientRegistrationEndpoint.description: OAuth2 authorization server client registration endpoint.

useInTestConsole.description: Authorization Server may be used in the test console.

useInApiDocumentation.description: Authorization Server may be used in the API documentation.

supportState.description: Authorization Server may support client credentials in body by spec. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.1"/>.

defaultScope.description: Scope that is going to applied by default on the console page. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-3.3"/>.

grantTypes.description: Form of an authorization grant, which the client uses to request the access token. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4"/>.

bearerTokenSendingMethods.description: Form of an authorization grant, which the client uses to request the access token. <see cref="http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749#section-4"/>.

clientId.description: Client ID of developer console which is the client application.

resourceOwnerUsername.description: Username of the resource owner on behalf of whom developer console will make requests.

resourceOwnerPassword.description: Password of the resource owner on behalf of whom developer console will make requests.

bearerTokenSendingMethods.description: How to send token to the server.

useInTestConsole.description: Open Id Connect Provider may be used in the test console.

useInApiDocumentation.description: Open Id Connect Provider may be used in the API documentation.

clientId.description: Client ID of developer console which is the client application.

required.description: Specifies whether parameter is required or not.

terms.description: Product terms and conditions. Developer will have to accept these terms before he's allowed to call product API.

subscriptionRequired.description: Specifies whether a product subscription is required for accessing APIs included in this product. If true, the product is referred to as "protected" and a valid subscription key is required for a request to an API included in the product to succeed. If false, the product is referred to as "open" and requests to an API included in the product can be made without a subscription key. If property is omitted when creating a new product it's value is assumed to be true.

approvalRequired.description: Specifies whether subscription approval is required. If false, new subscriptions will be approved automatically enabling developers to call the product’s APIs immediately after subscribing. If true, administrators must manually approve the subscription before the developer can call any of the product’s APIs. Can be present only if subscriptionRequired property is present and has a value of true.

subscriptionsLimit.description: Specifies the number of subscriptions a user can have to this product at the same time. Set to null or omit to allow unlimited per user subscriptions. Can be present only if subscriptionRequired property is present and has a value of false.

name.description: Depending on report endpoint specifies product, API, operation or developer name.

country.description: Country to which this record data is related.

region.description: Country region to which this record data is related.

zip.description: Zip code to which this record data is related.

callCountBlocked.description: Number of calls blocked due to invalid credentials.

callCountFailed.description: number of calls failed due to proxy or backend errors.

cacheHitCount.description: Number of times when content was served from cache policy.

cacheMissCount.description: Number of times content was fetched from backend.

apiTimeAvg.description: Average time it took to process request.

apiTimeMin.description: Minimum time it took to process request.

apiTimeMax.description: Maximum time it took to process request.

serviceTimeAvg.description: Average time it took to process request in backend.

serviceTimeMin.description: Minimum time it took to process request in backend.

serviceTimeMax.description: Maximum time it took to process request in backend.

schemaId.description: Schema identifier. Applicable only if 'contentType' value is neither 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' nor 'multipart/form-data'.

typeName.description: Type name defined by the schema. Applicable only if 'contentType' value is neither 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' nor 'multipart/form-data'.

formParameters.description: Collection of form parameters. Required if 'contentType' value is either 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' or 'multipart/form-data'.

queryParameters.description: Collection of operation request query parameters.

id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription.

endDate.description: Date when subscription was cancelled or expired.

query.description: Subscription key query string parameter name.

values.name: Suspended
values.description: Subscription is blocked. User whose subscription is blocked cannot call subscription's product APIs.

values.name: Expired
values.description: Subscription is expired. User whose subscription is expired cannot call subscription's product APIs.

name.description: Tag name. Must be 1 to 160 characters long.

description.description: Tag description. Must be 1 to 1000 characters long.

productId.description: Id of product. Is not required for all operations.

subscriptionId.description: Id of subscription. Is not required for all operations.

values.name: Blocked
values.description: User is blocked. Blocked users cannot authenticate at developer portal or call API.

values.name: Pending
values.description: User account is pending. Requires identity confirmation

values.name: Deleted
values.description: User account is closed. All identities and related entities are removed.

Azure.Core.FilterQueryParameter.name: filter
Azure.Core.FilterQueryParameter.description: Filter the result list using the given expression.

Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.name: skip
Azure.Core.SkipQueryParameter.description: The number of result items to skip.
